column1: Looks like I am better at wind manipulation!
It seems that the people in Gensokyo are not the ordinary folks.
Let's call it a day for today.
Damn your ability to pop in and out as you please.
I've been wanting to buy something from Outside for some time, too.
Well, I can give you some souvenirs from the Outside World if you wish.
Really? That’s awfully nice of you.
But be careful not to get noticed.
